result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas

records.addlTxt: Court in receipt of Defense's motion to adjourn motion hearing.  No objection from the State.  Court rescheduled motion hearing to January 27, 2023 at 10:00 AM.  Parties notified of court date.  Case adjourned to Branch 2, Rm 635 CH.
Received and Filed: Defense Motion to Adjourn Motion Hearing
Received and Filed: Defendant's Motion to Suppress- No Reasonable Suspicion for Detention Nor Probable Cause for Arrest

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas in court.  Attorney Colin Patrick McGinn in court for Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas.  Attorney Amanda Korin Kirklewski in court for State of Wisconsin. Defense waived intrepreter for hearing. Case in court for status conference. Defense requests motion hearing date. Defense motion due by 10-07-2022. Case remains calendared in Branch 2.
Motion hearing scheduled for October 28, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Received and filed. Justice Point Supervision Report. Deputy Court Clerk: EAB.

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas in court with attorney Colin Patrick McGinn.  Gerald Henry Alder appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn as interpreter: Daniel Lopez.
Case in court for Scheduling Conference. Attorney McGinn was recently appointed and is requesting a Status Conference date. Case adjourned to Br 02.  Status conference scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas in court with Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw; both appear by video.  Edward OBrien appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  Sworn as interpreter: Sarah Chwaszczewski appears by video.
Court took judicial notice of 20CF3121. Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Sworn for the State: MPD Officer Gamino. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 02.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pretrial Services Supervision Report

Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw in court, appear by video, defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas was in court, prior to case being called, in custody.  Karine O'Byrne appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness present. Attoreny Rakestraw advised the court that defendant needs a spanish interperter. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 6, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney William Anthony Rakestraw in court, defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas not in court, in custody.  James C Griffin appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
OFF THE RECORD. Status of counsel held. Case adjourned for preliminary hearing, Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas not in court, defendant in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for status of counsel. SPD has not yet appointed counsel. Case rescheduled off the record. Case adjourned, Branch 2 via Zoom.  Status conference scheduled for June 3, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas in court with attorney Thomas Holland Reed.  Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas in custody.  Amanda Korin Kirklewski appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas appeared by video means with Attorney.  Sworn as interpreter: Fred Svensson.  Discussion regarding efforts by the Office of the State Public Defender to appoint counsel set forth in the record.  Time limits remain tolled.  Case is adjourned for status of counsel in branch 2.  Status conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is not present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a State V. Lee hearing in the trial court.  Hearing scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas not in court, defendant in custody.  Abby Rockendorf appeared for the State of Wisconsin. SPD needs more time to appoint counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas not in court, defendant in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. States witness is present. SPD has not appointed counsel. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE for a Preliminary Hearing in Preliminary Hearing Court, Room 146 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.
Sworn as interpreter: Judy Veramendi

Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas in court with attorney Melissa Jane Fitzsimmons.  Defendant Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas in custody.  Anna Marie Meulbroek appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Carlos Manuel Lopez-Rojas appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Childs, Branch 02.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.   DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for March 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
